name: City Highway Racer Car Fast Traffic - Real Games

description:
Feel the rush of traffic in the city's project and became a living legend of roads on the highway.
City Highway Racer is an endless driver skills game in this kind of racing adventures.
If you want to feel the speed should be paid to the acceleration button the entire time, and its fun and exciting sports car racing simulation game. It is full of this amazing realistic driving a racer car simulation game full of the most wonderful and exciting fast racing car racing dynamic levels.
Drive your car through traffic, and earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. Try to be one of the fastest drivers in the world rankings. The race re-definition of infinite now!
The real engine of the car and rush it through other cars. Do not crash cars in national traffic.
Use earned money to upgrade your car, so you better and faster race. Your skills and design is the only limit. Become the best racing is illegal in professional street in the world!

Key Features:
• 3D graphics and realistic environment
• Amazing sound effects
• Earn cash prizes for the launch of a new car
• Detailed Environment
• 4 different engine cool racing cars
• The faster you pay the more points you get
• Dealing with the car smooth and realistic
